channel.title: Minor Glitch: Character customizer swaps skins when saving different character
channel.description:
If you have more than two characters and you apply changes to one of them, it will also change the skin of the other character.
It's a very minor bug, but i thought it was worth mentioning.
[img]https://i.imgur.com/acyRQeo.png[/img] [b]The actual selected skin[/size][/b]
[img]https://i.imgur.com/PDZfzhQ.png[/img] [b]After applying changes to another character, this character reverts it's skin to a different one. Note how the skin menu still says it's set on skin 5.[/size][/b]
